ThisWay Global is an AI and machine learning technology that use advanced ontologies to match, source, pre-screen and connect qualified talent to jobs. Proprietary de-biasing technology reduces bias also increases diversity and inclusion and helps companies prove compliance. AI4Jobs by ThisWay is a cloud-based web platform that integrates within existing applicant tracking systems (ATS) and candidate relationship management (CRM) systems or can be accessed through the interface itself to match qualified job candidates to jobs.

Share Good is a community engagement platform. Its technology offers a simple way for neighbors, nonprofits and businesses to come together to support their local communities. It is an inclusive search engine that makes it easy for people to find any local nonprofit and engage with them by donating money, volunteering time or buying much-needed items from nonprofit wish lists.On July 8, 2020, Share Good was acquired by SHARE Omada. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
freemarket.ai is building an intelligence platform for investing through automation.
Affable uses artificial intelligence to discover and activate authentic micro influencers to help brands and marketing agencies engage relevant influencers and analyze their campaigns.
Cell Evolution (细胞进化) is a blockchain-based game.

Commerce.Asia is an ecosystem builder that assists SMEs, brands, and micro-entrepreneurs to sell online by providing them with end to end omnichannel commerce solutions. Commerce.Asia develops these solutions by integrating best of breed technologies from Technology Enablers. Commerce.Asia brings together these Technology Enablers by making strategic investments, providing guidance and mentorship to them.
Empericus is a global health data partner, delivering cloud-based management solutions that address unmet needs.
Young Maker (少年创客) provides coding education.
MirrorCache has developed the SmartAccessMirror, a touch-enabled / voice-enabled smart mirror with a built-in safe aimed at improving security and convenience for the travel and hospitality sectors.
Socialeads develops an AI platform that helps financial services companies and their advisors to automatically know the size, depth, and value of their professional and personal social networks.
E-Moving is a Brazilian urban mobility company that offers electric bike rental services.

ioCurrents is a fleet management system for commercial vessels. ioCurrents MarineInsight offers key real-time insights about fleet health, allowing engineers and managers to better protect and manage assets, increase safety, and reduce maintenance and fuel costs.
Expandly is a Milton Keynes-based company whose cloud-based e-commerce platform allows retailers to sell across multiple channels worldwide.
YourOwnROOM provides online managed rentals for consumers.

Orca Money is a research and analysis service. It provides data and analysis on peer-to-peer investment opportunities, serving both financial advisers and retail investors. Orca Money provides retail investors and financial advisers with real-time data, allowing for investment benchmarking and asset selection.
Fourstarzz provides an influencer marketing aggregator platform for brands and agencies to increase the efficiency of creating influencer-driven marketing campaigns.
Sprockets identifies the values, needs and character traits of people and compares all candidates to that profile assuring better hires, happier employees and lower turnover.
ZoomDoc is a healthtech service that allows users to instantly book a general practitioner to arrive at their preferred location within one hour.

F13 Works offers a marketplace and dropship management platform while evolving a restricted category e-commerce and omnichannel integration platform. They work with brands to unite their products with influential online stores. These stores establish a targeted customer base and are desperately looking for more quality products to offer their audience. F13 unites brands with this network of established online retailers and watch the synergies grow both businesses.
Strawbees is a Swedish edtech company that provides a complete solution for developing new skills through hands-on exploration and working with design, construction, electronics and programming.

Peel-Works offers a cloud enabled sales force transformation and BPO firm. The company's technology solution organizes information, computes performance based ratings and incentives and uses analytics to do predictive modeling and generates recommendations around promotability, skill and competency.
Qvest is an online tool designed to institute change in large organizations. It functions as an online survey and provides information based on feedback.

Tame provides an all-in-one planning tool that allows event managers and teams to handle all their internal planning for events in real-time from building the event program, to coordinating the contacts and status of speakers, suppliers, sponsors and exhibitors, to managing all the files, collaborating in notes and tasks, while supporting their entire communication in one place. In addition, it has its own ticketing features that allow event managers to publish programs, speakers, and sponsors on a ticketing page, that can be customized to fit every organization.

AlphaSwap is a crowdsourced alpha capture and asset management platform powered by Blockchain-enabled voting. Its mission is to enable a global pool of active investors the opportunity to monetize their investment ideas and market views in a meritocratic, democratic and transparent ecosystem.

Opiniion is an automated tool for businesses to collect authentic real-time feedback from customers. Opiinion helps businesses get more online reviews while also helping them understand data around the customer experience through analytics.
DEV is a social network for developers.

Provider of a blockchain technology based local service sharing platform. The company operates a blockchain based platform that connects car-owners for sharing of gas services and car wash. The platform also designs as a marketing channel for promotional events and ads distribution.

Hectare Agritech is an agritech company entirely focused on exploiting current inefficiencies, and deficiencies, in the farming industry supply chains and has two principal products: SellMyLivestock and Graindex. SellMyLivestock is an internet marketplace enabling the online trade of farm livestock (currently, cattle, sheep and pigs) between farmers and their downstream trading chain (other farmers, abattoirs and retailers). Graindex is an internet marketplace enabling the online trade of combinable crops (currently grain, rape seed and pulses) between farmers and their downstream trading chain (other farmers, local/regional merchants and national/international merchants).
KAZoART is a marketplace that allows art lovers to discover new contemporary artists and buy original works of art online from the artists.
Solen has developed an application that can measure and certify the brightness of a property for sale. The company aims to make its luminosity certificate a selling point for real estate agents.
Bubblz develops SaaS platform that automates daily business operations.
Qwesta is a business performance diagnostic platform.
Brenger is a courier platform from the Netherlands. The platform connects individuals with unused space in cars and vans to transport packages.

Investly is an online platform where small companies can get business loans from other people. This enables companies to raise finance vital to sustaining or growing their business as well as giving investors the opportunity to earn above average returns.

Kombo aims to enable everyone to travel by bus, easily and at the best price. The company offers trips from all bus operators in France (Ouibus, Flixbus, Isilines, Eurolines) and carpooling with BlaBlaCar.
Vite Mon Marche ships fresh and local products to the homes of its urban clientele in less than an hour.

Cashkumar is a peer to peer lending company that connects loan seekers to individual lenders for short term loans where loan seekers get funded by lenders for their short term loan needs and return monthly EMIs in the form of principal and interest. Using its proprietary credit underwriting algorithm and its integration with India Stack, it lists loan seekers on its platform after proper offline verifications. These loan seekers then get funded by individuals who are lenders on the platform through a process which is completely online and seamless.
Blocnets is a system of integrated applications that operate together or individually to ensure the most dependable and secure supply chain for all companies.
Skippr acts as a virtual business finance manager. Skippr's customers can better control their finances using real-time cash flow insights and easy access finance.
Otus is a Russian-based provider of online training courses for developers.
Administrative League (行政联盟) is an enterprise administrative service platform.

Active Pathways, dba PickStar, offers a way to connect directly with elite athletes, legends and sports personalities for marketing campaigns, guest speaking gigs, corporate events, brand ambassador roles, skills clinics, meet and greets, fan experiences.

MavenView is a data analytics company that leverages artificial intelligence to deliver fast, reliable and accurate answers to strategic questions that companies face in their effort to achieve competitive advantage in their respective industries. The company utilizes algorithms and machine learning to identify and then predict the emergence of new technologies and landscape technological trends over time.
Quai des Notaires is a digital platform that aims to help notaries and their clients.

PayLead focuses on customer marketing by revealing the potential of transaction data. PayLead reconnects banks with their customers, offering them personalized and exclusive offers directly financed by merchants.

Linkura delivers a service to companies that want to reduce stress among employees. With their measurement device, the company keeps track of stress levels, sleep, activities and how sedentary the employees are.

FileInvite is a website app that transforms the way the user collects information from their clients. The user sends a FileInvite with the information they require and the client then uploads the files and information to a centralized location. The user can tick information off the check list as they receive documents and send automated reminders to motivate clients if required.

Noble House is a one stop shop for on-demand talent for all HR needs. The platform provides Independent HR consultants and senior HR professional a platform to showcase their capabilities and find work befitting their experience and skills.

SOELU is a fitness and entertainment platform that offers online yoga lessons. With this service, instructors and students can be connected by video chat, allowing users to receive live yoga lessons at home or anywhere they want
boodmo is an online marketplace for automotive spare parts and is based in India.
Suxin IoT Solution provides industrial monitoring and control services powered by our end-to-end sensor, connectivity, cloud, and analytics systems.
Yezi Technology (野子科技) is an e-sports API and big data service provider.
Leyeju (乐易住) is an unmanned intelligent hotel brand.
Maitianli (麦田里) provides English tutorial service.
Cocktail Porter is a monthly subscription service for ready-to-make cocktails.
Kasaz is a Barcelona, Spain-based company offering a property information platform.

Propseller operates a platform that allows users to compare agents. It collects and verifies ratings of agents and analyzes their historical transaction data. Based on both the given criteria and agents' track record, the user will be presented with a list of three to ten estate agents.
BrickCode provides coding education for children.
HaoChiMei is a lifestyle eCommerce platform that provides local group buying services.
Nanquan Huyu engages in games, web dramas, short videos, business ads, e-sports business and so on.
Unstoppable Domains is a blockchain company that operates a decentralized domain registry that offers websites that can't be taken down by government authorities or traditional domain providers.
DILK is a global mining platform established by the digital asset research institute, IFTIME.
Choice is a way to pay that reduces and redistributes transaction fees for businesses, giving those savings to charities.
My Cooking Box is an Italy-based provider of meal kits with pre-measured ingredients and recipes ready to be cooked.
Manabi-aid is an online learning platform that offers video lectures.

SENRI is a sales optimization tool for manufacturing and distribution businesses in Africa. The platform supports order management, customer management, and sales activities in the manufacturing and wholesale industries.
Famedr Intelligence (铭钔智能) focuses on the development of smart home, smart community and intelligent security products.

Peoplender is the operator of Fundaztic, an online marketplace for P2P financing. The platform enables issuers to access easy financing through a simple online application process, while investors are able to provide funds to multiple Investment Notes in exchange for attractive returns of investments.
360PAI is a credit and asset internet auction platform.
Heidian is a new energy auto media platform that provides testing reports on new energy auto.
Zhaoguangwang is a B2B offline advertising search booking platform that helps users find advertising media.
Tell Me Baby is a baby product review site based in Australia.
Influo is an online platform that brings influencers and marketers closer together and provides tools to manage marketing campaigns from A to Z.

Happening Technologies is an online arts journal providing an exhaustive overview of art world news. The company publishes a daily stream of content in the form of short-format dispatches, a daily digest, and commentary pieces following the artists, curators, institutions, galleries, businesses and collectors shaping the future of the world's artistic scenes.

WORK180 is a job search platform that only includes companies that actively work to forward women's careers and have a welcoming environment for them. The site has strict rules around the kind of jobs it lists, with an emphasis on pay equity, flexible working, women in leadership, and paid parental leave.
Malkyrs Studio is a video game publisher that offers the opportunity to play a digital game with physical cards, maintaining the improvements gained from the dematerialization of Internet gambling.

NOKK is an Australian digital platform where homeowners and buyers connect. The platform uses an algorithm to match buyers to homeowners, allowing buyers to register interest in a property, and for homeowners to list their homes and gauge interest, with no obligation on either side.

JobHop is a matchmaking platform for recruitment purposes. JobHop automates the sourcing process and help make work happen faster, easier and cheaper. JobHop ATS (Applicant Tracking System) helps companies streamline their recruitment process, enhance predictive analytics, smart reporting to ultimately save time and focus on the candidates.

It'sByU is a platform that combines digital goods and floral supplies in one kit so that anyone can have a fun and successful flower arranging experience at home and save up to 80% off of what a florist would charge. The platform bundles together physical and digital goods, video, and, soon, an instructional augmented reality app and SMS messaging. Its kits contain all the flowers, tools, containers, and streaming online lessons needed to make professional-looking flower arrangements at home. Kits are delivered right to our customers' doors as monthly subscriptions or one-off purchases.
Pharmaseal is developing cloud software to allow pharmaceutical companies to manage clinical trials effectively.
Silkpay is a Paris-based B2B platform that offers services in mobile, in-store, and online payments, as well as marketing services.

BlackCurve Solutions is a provider of a pricing management platform for online retailers. The software provides pricing tools in order to find the optimal price for goods and services through pricing algorithms and machine learning and improve revenue growth and profitability.
Manigo is a digital money platform that connects consumers, businesses, and merchants. Manigo enables consumers to make payments, businesses to track expenses, and merchants to receive payments.
Datazoom provides a cloud-based platform that enables companies to capture data from video players and other endpoints in sub-second real-time and deliver it to whatever systems need it.

We Build Bots is the developer of a chatbot platform called IntelAgent. The IntelAgent chatbot works by applying AI to conversations captured via messaging platforms, SMS, email, social and voice to efficiently and accurately automate answers, perform tasks, identify sales opportunities and more.

Bidcoin, dba Codex Protocol, is a decentralized title registry for Art and Collectibles. Codex stores ownership and provenance while ensuring privacy. Powered by the DEX native token, the Codex Protocol is open source, allowing third party players in the A&C ecosystem to build applications and utilize the title system. Codex's landmark application, Biddable, is a smart deposit-escrow system deeply integrated into the Codex protocol, solving the biggest issues faced in A&C auctions: non-performing bidders, lack of privacy, and barriers to market access.

8minyoga is an online community platform that allows users to stay connected and book yoga classes and events in real time. The Freemium web platform and mobile app allows users to gain easier access to any yoga related topics such as events, classes, contact with like-minded yogis, and yoga knowledge.

gNext Labs is a data processing, visualization, and management service for critical infrastructure. Its web-service digitizes, visualizes, and analyzes critical infrastructure. By using A.I. as the backbone, its technology can provide time and costs savings, as well as insights for asset-intensive enterprises and inspection/surveying companies.
Insurello proactively educates people about their insurances and manages as well as maximizes their claims through a simple digital solution.
Only Sky provides an activity booking and management platform to the mountain destination space, with partners across the U.S., Chile, New Zealand, Japan, and Europe.
Rent Technologies, dba Homepilot, is an online rental management service.
Recrutimmo is a platform for linking employers and real estate professionals.
Handiscover has developed a global marketplace for booking holiday accommodation adapted for disabled persons.

iQSpot is a software-as-a-service offer, including access to a web based dashboard for monitoring consumption and a mobile application that keeps every occupant of the building constantly informed about their energy consumption and comfort.
SkinLabo is an online retailer of personal care products.
Virtual Metalstreet, aka Metal Street, provides a platform that allows supply-chain participants such as manufacturers, distributors, retailers and end-users to discover, connect and trade on the go.
Bridge Financial Technology creates financial technology which allows advisors to streamline operations and grow their client base.
Fakahany allows users in Cairo and Giza governorates to order fresh fruits and vegetables through its online platform or mobile apps for iOS and Android.

OTO Capital is an automotive fintech platform that enables customers to own their dream vehicle through a new way of financing with flexible usage terms where a user pays for a car with a low, all-in, month-to-month payment.
eddress offers a fleet management solution and last mile delivery aggregator for merchants and logistics companies.

Provider of restaurant an online guide. The company provides a platform to reserve, search, and give points to restaurants based on their service, food, and site. Through the site customers can find a restaurant with search filters based on proximity and type, give it points based on how they liked it, and book a table. The site also compares its ratings with those of other popular social media.

Compellon provides Alpha signals and financial analytics to hedge funds, asset managers and quantitative traders. Compellon's Alpha Signal Factory analyzes massive amounts of alternative and conventional data, augmented with behavioral and sentiment analysis to deliver pre-emptive and descriptive analytics.On September 22nd, 2021, Compellon was acquired by Clearsense. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Goboony is an online marketplace where motor home owners can advertise their campers and travelers can rent fun, luxurious motor homes. Goboony users can also share their experiences, routes, maintenance tips and places to go.
PT Blink is an Australian technology company that has developed a solution that empowers users to design, manufacture and assemble multi-storey structures very quickly.
Oddbox is a subscription service offering vegetables that are visually imperfect and otherwise would have gone to waste.

Alphonse's Talents is a collaborative platform that recreates the social link between generations. Talents d'Alphonse connects young people who want to learn a particular skill (sewing, music, foreign languages etc.) with a retiree passionate about that area and who lives nearby.

Feedr is a marketplace for businesses to provide employees with personalized meals from independent food suppliers. In addition to being a platform for businesses to source healthy catering for breakfasts, lunches, and events, Feedr sets up "Cloud Canteens" for employees to purchase healthy meals at the office from a daily rotating menu.On May 26th, 2020, Feedr was acquired by Compass Group at a valuation of $24M.

LawLytics is an online platform designed for small law firms to help market their business.On November 16th, 2021, LawLytics was acquired by Smokeball, LEAP Legal, and InfoTrack. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Sumpli is a staffing tool and talent marketplace for food service industry companies in the Nordics.
MeVitae is dedicated to solving the world's biggest recruitment challenges through the use of cognitive technology and application tracking systems.

Dynepic offers a service called iOKids, which is a secure, social gateway to enable kid's connection into the digital world, all under the watchful eye of the parent. iOKids aims to make it easy for brands to build and launch social and community experiences for kids, all while parents can easily manage who their children interact with online.

Roaring builds services to create better digital flows and processes for customer relations and business online. The company offers smooth on-boarding, fast KYC-controls and updated customer data to businesses.

Tributi, dba Impuesto Correcto, is automating the tax space by offering services to individual taxpayers, but also to accountants who want to go digital. Taxpayers go on Tributi's website to answer a range of questions about their finances, including revenue, expenses, assets, and debts. The platform then generates a personalized set of forms to help the user upload this data and provides online assistance in case of need.
Weever Apps provides cloud-based software that captures data, manages workflows, and accesses insights.
Bloom At Work is a solution for measuring a company's well-being and employee satisfaction.On May 11th, 2021, Bloom At Work was acquired by Lucca. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Husky offers marketing software which centralizes all marketing data in one user-friendly tool, making it visible to all team members.
Avekapeti is a food delivery service for businesses that provides homemade meal trays delivered straight to the office.

CloudRail provides products and solutions that allow software developers to build software applications that interoperate with any type of data provider without wasting time for integrations. The company provides an API that allows it to connect to multiple cloud services or devices with the system managing all conversions between the different communication standards automatically.
Intelligence Fusion is a secure online intelligence, security and risk fusion platform covering land, sea and air.

PureClarity uses artificial intelligence to analyze customers' behavior and deliver a personalized customer experience through product recommendations, personalized marketing campaigns, personalization within search as well as email, helping retailers to boost online revenue.
Pointvoucher is changing the ad and loyalty space by building a gaming and voucher platform for brands and major cities.

Vortex IoT designs and supplies low-power wireless sensor networks producing the intelligence and data for enterprise decision making. Its IoT Gateway enables secure, smart management and on-boarding of assets and resources.
Wado is a sustainable shoe brand based in Barcelona, Spain that plants two trees for every pair of shoes sold.

Chia Network develops a blockchain and smart transaction platform based on storage-based mining. Unlike other cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin or ethereum which rely on proof of work to validate their network transactions, Chia is based on a proof of space-time consensus algorithm. In this case, a Chia farmer (akin to a miner) is responsible for sending a proof to a verifier of a transaction. In the case of Chia, solid-state drives (SSD) or hard-drive disks (HDD) are used to store the data.
EqSeed is a Brazil-based equity crowdfunding platform.

Jiraffe is the operator of price comparison site Hikakaku!, a platform for second-hand goods that lists numerous resellers and the prices for which they are likely going to buy the user's unwanted products. The company also offers Peing, an anonymous Q&A box service, and magi, a flea market app specialized in trading cards.

Olivia Landau is the creator of The Clear Cut, which offers a concierge service for consumers to design their own diamond engagement rings. The idea is to offer a personalized experience and product at significant savings compared to the big-name jewelry stores.
Cizoo is a mobile application accessible to everyone from the age of 13 that lets users communicate and express themselves through song.
Clear is a liquor-focused company that operates SAKE100, a liquor e-commerce platform, and SAKETIMES, a specialty media platform.
TradFit is the developer of a cloud-based, AI-enabled audio data platform that provides multilingual support services for hotels and restaurants.

Linc'well operates Clinic For, a digital healthcare platform that provides support for clinical management. Clinic For offers services such as online booking and medical treatment, electronic medical record management, and more.

Real Time Group is a Russian company specializing in identifying goods by bar code and customer data by mobile phone number. It was launched in 2013. The team consists of 10 people working in the state, and 5 people outside the state.
Stash Storage is an on-demand self-storage business that offers pickup, storage and return services.
PaisaDukan is a P2P lending marketplace platform wherein borrowers can take loans from individual investors who are willing to lend their own money for an agreed upon interest rate.

Park N Parcel is a Singapore-based last-mile logistics that provides a self-collection system for online shoppers. It allows for purchases to be delivered somewhere other than to the home, such as a neighbor's house or a local store to pick up at a convenient time. Shoppers can search Park N Parcel's website to pinpoint available "parkers" – the close-to 1,500 vetted proxies who can receive deliveries. The shopper gets a notification from Park N Parcel when their package arrives so that they can go and collect it from the parker.

Adriel is an AI-based ad optimization solution that helps users to design and run advertisements, whatever the budget. Adriel can automatically create banner ads, determine targets and channels, post the ads, and more. The company was originally founded in Seoul, South Korea.
OM Cash is a full-spectrum, blockchain financial solution accessible to anyone with a mobile device.

8 Interactive is developing a light-weight, multi-channel and affordable open platform that combines human helpdesk, chatbot templates, customer insight and marketing automation, powered by Artificial Intelligence.

ForMotiv is an end-to-end platform for reducing online risk and improving customer experience that measures end-user behavioral biometrics in real-time to detect future outcomes like fraud, delinquency, profitability, and abandonment as users engage with digital applications.

Reposit provides a technology platform for tenants to affordably manage the deposit needed to move property in the UK. The company offers a paperless alternative to the tenancy deposit system with tenants paying a 1 week fee through their letting agent (using e-signature and online payment at the time of signing their agreement) and landlords getting all the assurances of a conventional deposit, with faster payouts and less obstacles. The company's service provides six weeks worth of cover to the landlord for damages, unpaid rent, cleaning costs and any other charges associated with deductions from a security deposit. The platform also allows agents and landlords to communicate any charges to tenants, who remain liable for damages caused, allowing them to settle the balance instantly.
Killing Kittens is a female empowerment brand that offers events and a social platform.

Manufacturing Source is an on-demand manufacturing platform that connects design and production engineers with suitable and trusted manufacturers to create custom parts. The site uses artificial intelligence and machine learning to calculate instant quotes for custom parts and identify the most suitable manufacturing partners based on capabilities and capacity.
The Drop makes menswear on demand, specializing in laser-cut and hand-finished suits that can be made to any style, color and size.

Finpay is a platform to provide patients with financing solutions at point-of-care so they are able to afford the healthcare they need. The company aims to deliver a patient financial experience that mirrors the high-quality clinical care they receive from their doctor.
AgroCenta provides an online trading hub for farmers and their customers using real-time payments leveraged by mobile-money technologies, as well as an on-demand logistics service.
Blyng provides an AI virtual assistant for real estate agents.

EngageRocket is a cloud-based software that applies workplace analytics to improve talent retention and productivity. The platform analyzes feedback from employee surveys in real-time to advise leaders on building and maintaining the organizational culture, as well automating survey administration, analysis, and the resultant generation of advice to management.

Troo allows businesses to compare energy renewal prices. Troo Assure offers 'energy as a service' by providing customers with advice on issues such as new meter connections, energy saving, interruption of service and compliance.
Perfocal is a photography marketplace aimed at making professional photography easily accessible and affordable for people.
Avionero is an online flight search. Users search by number of travelers, departure, and destination city.
Shopopop facilitates the delivery of groceries and parcels between individuals.
Grao Direto is an online agribusiness platform that connects grain producers to buyers in a practical and efficient way.
Trusturk is a platform that provides value-added services for both e-commerce and retail, especially in finance.

Feedmypockets is a part-time employment marketplace, sourcing and recruiting candidates for small, hourly pay jobs, temporary jobs, seasonal jobs, etc. FeedMyPockets provides workforce management solutions, making it easier for employers to both source talent and to manage their hourly or part-time workforce.

YOLO is the operator of Yeogoo, a cross-border commerce platform that matches users seeking overseas products to travelers with extra carrying space. This allows users to conveniently and affordably receive products that are only available locally, while enabling travelers to make extra cash.

Developer of e-commerce support services. The company develops a solution which is designed to help businesses create and manage e-commerce sites. It also aims to provide features such as sales analysis, site access data, and customer information.

Sensei is a business intelligence solution that captures non-sales/in-store information using security cameras and merges this information with other retailer data to provide recommendations and insights.

Bleexo measures and analyzes all dimensions of employee engagement. Bleexo can help HR managers facilitate employee engagement, help leaders from other departments align their teams, and help employees participate directly in improving their quality of life at work.

HungerBox is a full stack business to business (B2B) food and beverage (F&B) technology company delivering food solutions for corporates in India. The company's vision is to enhance the productivity of corporate employees by providing them a technology driven food experience.

Ministry of Supply aims to invent the future of business apparel, changing how business wear is designed, made and delivered. The company combines advanced materials with innovative product design and manufacturing brought together by an engaging experience.

UConcepts Solutions, dba UClean, is a tech enabled laundry service provider. UClean enables customers to wash their clothes at the nearest UClean outlet, as per their convenience, and is developing a tech platform wherein customers can pre-book their slots at the nearest UClean store or schedule a pick and drop facility from their homes.
Mentor Collective partners with universities to design, manage, and assess programs that give all students access to a relevant near-peer mentor.
Auvo has developed an external team management software that allows users to communicate, create forms and checklists, schedule tasks and more.
Pear (ピア) is the developer of OMNI-CORE (オムニコア), an eCommerce store management and support system.

Voyage is a mobile messaging platform that lets e-commerce marketers engage with customers through personalized messages. Voyage uses a system that automatically sends an engaging mobile message to each subscriber- this can be information about an upcoming sale, shipping or CS updates, or even product recommendations.

Evolany develops conversational UX products that help businesses succeed in social automation. Its products include Anybot, an integrated social marketing and customer management chatbot tool that realizes personalized automatic customer service through customer relationship management (CRM) and marketing automation (MA) functions.

Notify Technology offers a health and safety software solution that combines expertise in big data, machine learning and analytics with the growing use of smart devices to make sure near misses and incidents are reported as accurately and quickly as possible.
UPGRD Photos provides photography software that automates designs and adds professional graphic design possibilities.
SEON Technologies offers end-to-end fraud prevention and detection tools for businesses. Its AI-powered system uses data enrichment and machine learning to reduce revenue loss and manual review time.

Provider of a price comparison portal for selling articles. The company operates a website which is designed to allow users to compare prices of what they want to sell. The articles one can sell include games, second hand books, DVDs, cameras, and music instruments.
AIATOR specializes in deep learning neural network algorithm and data-driven artificial intelligence model construction.
ableX Healthcare connects patients, therapists and the care team through an automated platform and seeks to achieve neurological recoveries.
NBN23 is a platform for organizing, digitizing, and analyzing sports.
Supertripper is a business trip management platform that enables companies as well as independent business travelers to set up travel policy, centralize and manage billing and expense reports.

RemplaFrance is a platform that connects health professionals to ensure the continuity of patient care during holidays, maternity leave or retirement.On October 13th 2020, RemplaFrance was acquired by Adecco Group. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
uTip provides a set of monetization tools to independent content creators on the internet.
CureFit offers products and solutions for preventive and curative healthcare, combining engagement, coaching, and delivery through a mix of online and offline channels.

Spider Labs provides solutions to combat ad fraud and ensure data security. It offers SpiderAF, an AI-based ad fraud tool that protects advertisement campaigns from fraudulent users trying to sabotage a company's budget or brand image.

Mapadore is a Salesforce native sales optimization engine that intervenes during the appointment booking process to provide geo-optimized appointments in line with a given sales strategy to help sales people work on the go.

Elementus is a protocol and platform that enables combining, analyzing, and programming on data from all non-private blockchains. With Elementus, data consumers like financial firms, software developers, and analysts can build new classes of applications.

Event Banana is a prop-tech startup that provides a platform to allow property owners to rent and promote their under-utilised spaces. It also enables people to find and book the spaces for meetings and events.

Habble, founded in 2012, provides a cloud-based suite of business applications to enterprises, telephone operators and system integrators, which combines telecom expense management with real time optimization of costs and processes in all of the business areas. The solutions aims to simplify and optimize the activities of the various business units, including general management, IT, purchasing, and sales and marketing.

CTO.ai builds systems of intelligence for software companies to help them scale intelligently. It helps teams understand how quickly the team is shipping value to production, and measure velocity by metrics like repo, date, milestone, bug, and people.
Capptu enables users to buy real pictures of real people.
Bquate provides a platform for musicians and labels for everything from the digital distribution and monetization of YouTube videos to the collection of royalties.

Spacein is an all-in-one ecosystem for infrastructure management of coworkers, tech-hubs, collective smart offices and event spaces. Spacein gives coworking the automation of the business processes. It features CRM, online payments, widgets, and more.

RentSher is a horizontal marketplace for rental products with end to end services from choosing and booking the product online to delivery and pick-up. The company's customers range from parents booking a single costume for their kid for school function to cultural events at apartments or home parties to PAN India multi-day large corporate events.
Logivan is a Vietnam-based logistics service provider, offering a marketplace that connects freights with truck drivers directly.
CarePacks provides a subscription service for healthy snack food packages.

Whyral is an AI-based decentralized influencer marketing and influencer evaluation platform powered by Blockchain. It connects brands with social media rockstars. Whyral uses an AI engine to evaluate influencers' social media profiles and rank them.

Evolany develops conversational UX products that help businesses succeed in social automation. Its products include Anybot, an integrated social marketing and customer management chatbot tool that realizes personalized automatic customer service through customer relationship management (CRM) and marketing automation (MA) functions.

Moblrn offers an all-in-one tool that allows users to create and publish digital training, without any previous technical skills. Intuitive, easy, step-by-step creation allows users and their organization to offer fast, fun and effective microlearning, by serving small chunks of knowledge through a smart phone.

Scratch Music Group is a music and technology company that features a network of DJs which it leverages for events. Scratch has built a national team of heavily screened marquee DJs (1,000 members), which it utilizes for thousands of weddings, corporate events, tours, and music festivals each year. The company also runs the Scratch DJ Academy - a DJ and music production learning center co-developed with Jam Master Jay of Run DMC, with locations in NYC, Miami, LA and Chicago.
Western Rise creates performance clothing with highly technical fabrics. The clothing is responsibly built to function for the outdoors, travel, and everyday.

In2Books, dba CricketTogether, is an eMentoring platform. It offers corporate volunteers a meaningful and rewarding opportunity to engage with students and teachers in a safe and secure virtual learning environment that reaches far beyond the classroom. Serving as eMentors, employees of partner companies are paired one-on-one with students to read intriguing articles and exchange online letters about what they've read and how it relates to the world around them.

Ricult allows farmers to connect with online buyers and sell their produce at relatively better rates. It also allows farmers to take loans that can help them advance their farming and make them more financially stable.

GoBumpr is an end-to-end pitstop for car and bike owners to find, book and pay for automobile services. GoBumpr offers a tech-enabled service booking and fulfillment platform for any kind of car and bike service needs.On June 29, 2021, GoBumpr was acquired by MyTVS. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
SMS Software, dba CoinText.io, is a blockchain company developing a way to conduct offline bitcoin cash transactions.

This Is Not A Sushi Bar

Page Vault was founded with a vision to enable lawyers to easily and securely capture web content – everything from standard web pages to blogs and social media pages – for subsequent use as evidence in US courts. The need for lawyers to easily capture web pages themselves, while still maintaining a secure chain of custody on the content, has grown tremendously in recent years without a clear solution. Anything from a Facebook post that proves insurance fraud to a corporate site with trademark infringements can be critical to a case, yet can also quickly change or disappear. Recent court rulings state that ordinary screen captures are not admissible unless captured by a "trusted third party." In response, Page Vault is a cloud-based (Software-as-a-Service) subscription solution that...

Reactful helps convert visitors that are "on the fence" by understanding their "digital body language" such as "confusion", "hesitation", "interest", "form abandonment" and more, and reacting accordingly in real time. Reactions can be as subtle as shaking a button gently or attention-grabbing such as folding an element in 3D. Reactful continuously analyzes traffic and recommends best practice reactions to be launched with one click.
