Involve AI offers a customer data platform to help businesses identify risks and increase customer retention.

Brio Systems is a health management company. Brio Systems puts together a functional approach to wellness by using biotech tools and behavior change technology, to offer a sustainable approach to health.
Fincura is a cloud-based platform that automates the processing of commercial loan data.
Openly offers an insurer platform selling modern products through independent agents.
Sophia links patients to nearby therapist based on needs and preferences from filling out an online form.
Gimme Radio is a communication platform that connects fans, DJs, and artists, and its relevent music merchandizing.
Hello Tickets is an international ticketing platform designed for travelers.

Seated frictionless ticketing experience for live events. Without having to download an app, fans are able to purchase tickets through text message. It also allows fans to track their favorite live acts, so they are able to see them live when they visit their town.On February 15th, 2021, Seated was acquired by Sofar Sounds. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

Soundcharts helps the music industry make decisions by tracking social, charts, playlists & airplay data in real time and making them available from any device. Soundcharts is a full-stack solution (database, desktop, mobile apps & API) that brings together real-time and historical music consumption data, (social networks, charts positions, playlists, airplay monitoring) to improve project management, reporting and artist scouting.

Kobo360 is an app that connects Nigerian truckers to companies with freight needs. Kobo360 also features the Kobo Wealth Investment Network, or KoboWIN-a crowd-invest, vehicle financing program through which Kobo drivers can finance new trucks through citizen investors and pay them back directly (with interest) over a 60 month period.
Leena AI is building HR bots (aka conversational AI) to answer questions for employees and create an automated employee helpdesk.
Anima makes a set of plug-ins for popular interface design platform Sketch.

Aunt Flow is a buy one, give one, subscription based model for feminine hygiene products. Women can go online, customize her box of 18 tampons, and have it delivered to her door. For every box she receives, a box goes to a woman in need.

Meru Health is an online medical clinic treating depression and burnout. Meru Health's treatment program combines psychological treatment modules, patient data, and a licensed therapist. Meru Health individualizes the program based on patient's personal information and needs.
ExceptionAlly aims to help parents understand, organize and communicate all the info around providing care and education for a child with special needs, from autism to Down Syndrome.
Cardio Cube is a med-tech company empowering hospitals and insurance companies through cloud-based cognitive computing to support cardiovascular disease patient-centric treatment.

Digital Medical Tech is a solution for hospital management and asset tracking. Users can overcome surgical scheduling problems while eliminating wasteful spending, increase vendor communications, provide increased transparency, track surgical equipment, and increase overall patient safety.

MedPilot is a medical bill resolution platform. MedPilot offers healthcare providers fully automated software to help patients resolve their outstanding bills before being sent to third-party debt collectors.On February 17th, 2021, MedPilot was acquired by Vytalize Health. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

SureConsent is improving patient-physician communication through interactive, video-based educational modules that explain medical information to patients and get their electronic consent. It helps providers save time, improve patient understanding and outcomes, and improve legal compliance.
Railsbank is a banking and compliance platform that connects together a global network of partner banks with companies who want API access to banking.
Alive5 provides businesses with PCI-compliant chat software that allows them to engage and seamlessly accept payments from customers via website, social-media accounts, and text messaging.

augmen.tv is an augmented reality (AR) company that works with existing television technology. Users are able to see television programs in AR by holding up their mobile devices to their television screens. The firm also operates eyecandylab, which develops interactive video experiences in augmented reality for brands.
Orai provides sales pitch analysis software and a personal AI speech coach that aims to improve content and delivery.
Tally Interactive is an interactive live video media company.

Trapica Labs allows marketing campaigns on social networks to reach the right audiences at the right time by leveraging an artificial intelligence algorithm that autonomously optimizes targeting decisions in real time.
WiARframe is a prototyping tool that allows creatives to effortlessly craft interactive augmented reality content, without any coding, 3D knowledge, or expensive equipment.
Renewal Mill is an online retailer of okara flour.
TradeLanes is a software as a service platform that enables shippers, merchants and traders to better control their supply chain.

Traive uses big data to create a credit profile for farmers. The company looks beyond credit scores and considers factors like agronomic performance, experience, and growth potential. Its diversification models ensure protection for lenders and cost savings for farmers.
Bellwethr is a conversion and retention platform that uses machine learning to optimize every process in the customer lifecycle.

Townfolio provides trusted and current data on municipalities across Canada and the United States. From dusty shelves to APIs, its database tracks over 100 sources. The company displays the data in dashboards, a compare tool, a benchmarking feature, with the ability to power any website with data using its dashboard embed feature.

WattBuy is an online electricity marketplace that helps users save on their electricity costs by switching you to a cheaper electricity provider. WattBuy empowers residents to make better-informed decisions about their home electricity costs by allowing them to browse and select plans in their area.
2ndKitchen enables businesses without a kitchen to serve food using a custom menu from nearby restaurants.
Clyde has built an API for merchants that allows them to plug into the system and add product guarantee options without having to create the program from scratch.
Hurry Home provides alternative financing for homes for which banks cannot profitably originate mortgages, enabling renters to become homeowners.
Kai makes a digital fitness coach that communicates with users only through text messages. It is powered by augmented intelligence and engages users about their fitness goals and feelings.

Rheaply enables companies to share and sell physical assets within and between organizations on its modernized asset management platform. With Rheaply’s Asset Exchange Manager (AxM), organizations in a number of verticals, including higher education, healthcare, technology, government, and retail, can gain transparency about and utilize available assets, which enables them to decrease procurement costs, storage costs, and unnecessary waste.
Kwambio is a platform for creating unique, personalized products on 3D printers.

AstroPrint develops the software that makes 3D printing simple. AstroPrint is an end to end desktop 3D printing platform available to OEMs for private branding, or for individual use under the AstroPrint brand. This platform makes desktop 3D printers wireless, touchscreen, and cloud aware at minimal cost to OEMs. End users can slice, print, and store files straight from their phones, computers, or tablets.On September 7th, 2021, Astroprint was acquired by BCN3D. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Castor exists to combine intelligence with 3D printing. The company connects manufacturers to 3D printing capabilities to enhance their business and provide our technical expertise.

Partsimony is focused on prototyping, sourcing, and supply chain management.﻿ The company is changing the way growing hardware companies collaborate with their existing manufacturer network, and discover new vetted manufacturers.

StormSensor sells wireless sensors and accompanying software to municipalities, government agencies, and industrial facilities that want to track and prevent stormwater pollution or flooding. It’s meant to replace manual stormwater quality reporting with a fully digital solution that uses predictive algorithms.

ThisFish traces seafood back to its origins: who caught it, when, where, and how. ThisFish is committed to helping its customers make more informed choices about the authenticity and quality of the seafood they eat, while promoting fishers. Fisher harvesters identify their catch with a code using a tag or label, upload information to ThisFish, ship the fish, and the customer can trace exactly where the fish came from.
Conserve With Us is a platform that allows people and communities to connect with critical land conservation projects and protect the places that matter to them.
DeepHow develops artificial intelligence (AI) solutions and specializes in static technical manuals and interactive workflow guidance services.
Humanising Autonomy is helping autonomous vehicles understand pedestrian behavior across cultures.
Priva is inventing a new way to travel in luxury while skipping the hassles of flying.
42Maru is an AI deep-tech startup that develops a deep semantic QA platform that understands the true intention of a user’s question to provide a single answer from a large unstructured data set.
Kencko is an online retailer of an instant fruit and veg drink made from 100% organic, natural ingredients with no added sugars.

Clicktivated is a fun and engaging patent pending technology that allows for direct interaction within online video. Simply click on an item inside a video and be directed to a site to buy or learn more about that product/item. Its that simple!

ProcessBolt empowers the enterprise vendor risk management process by replacing spreadsheets and emails with AI powered interactive questionnaires, process tracking, notifications, alerting, data driven dashboards and risk metrics.

Satisfi Labs is an AI-powered Knowledge Management Platform that makes conversation with places possible. Its proprietary Answer Engine enables search for physical locations through conversational AI, allowing places to directly answer customer questions on-demand. The platform takes in structured and unstructured data and makes it AI-ready, allowing the Answer Engine to create expert virtual assistants on the web, mobile, SMS, and voice channels.

Sozie develops a platform that enables online retailers to grow by engaging online shoppers with community-generated content including pictures of products tried-on, size and fit feedback, reviews and videos.

TO THE MARKET partners with existing artisan groups employing vulnerable communities, connecting them to global consumers and helping them grow their business. It promotes artisanal goods to the market via multiple distribution channels, including pop-up sh ops, custom sourcing, retail partnerships, and its online marketplace. It offers a platform for artisans and their champions to share their stories with a new, larger audience.
Adtuo specializes in social media advertising that democratizes social media advertising.
Alpha Vantage is a cloud-based financial market data and analytics platform.
Jido Maps is a Palo Alto-based AR company whose API uses intimate understanding of a users spatial context to preserve AR experiences across users and devices.

Blutag helps consumers rapidly find products relevant to their needs and taste using simple voice commands. Users can search product catalogs through voice based devices like Amazon Echo and google home.

Helix builds voice-powered digital assistants for the laboratory sciences. A HelixAI digital assistant responds to natural language queries with real-time auditory responses; allowing access the information in a completely hands-free way.
Imageous is an AI solution for comfort controls and other space management features in commercial buildings, taking in user requests and making changes to their surrounding environment.
Jargon enables voice applications on services like Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant to structure, manage, and optimize their content.
Presence AI offers an AI-powered text and voice communications tool that enables and facilitates messaging between customers and merchants.
Aligned Business is an end-to-end digital platform that enables carriers to rapidly create, define, underwrite and distribute any category of insurance product to any market.
Buddy offers on-demand accident insurance for an active, outdoor lifestyle.

Fitness Interactive Experience is dedicated to making fitness fun, accessible and socially connected through an interactive social media platform designed to make the pursuit of fitness an enjoyable and engaging game. FIX's first game, UtiliFIT, is focused on helping people reduce sedentary behavior and live more active, energetic lives.
Dobby is an AI-driven, zero-touch, fully digital home maintenance platform for homeowners, real estate agents and service providers.
MamaMend is a digital health platform and postpartum guide that informs, empowers and improves health outcomes for new moms.

Safely is the trust and safety company for the peer-to-peer economy, beginning with short-term home rentals. By quantifying the reservation risk, Safely verifies the guest as trustworthy, and matches up to $1 million of liability coverage from a network of insurance underwriters. Homeowners are comfortable renting for the first time, and even making their home available for an instant booking to any Internet stranger on a global booking site such as Expedia.
Send Reality offers full 3D-modeling for virtual walkthroughs of real estate listings.
CowryWise is a secure, automated service that helps users save money and enjoy high returns from risk-free investments in Nigeria with zero fees.

Inbound Retargeting Technologies, dba RetargetLinks and fka Adlinks, operates in the online advertising space and offers user-friendly tools to allow advertisers, media agencies, and marketers to advertise to their social media, email, and blog followers. The RetargetLinks software allows social media, inbound, and email advertisers to create short links that anonymously tag people clicking on the links; these tags are then recognized by ad networks and publishers, allowing them to create targeted banner ads.
Emptor is a network that connects companies with local contractors in order to get those projects off the ground effectively.
Dinesafe crowdsources food poisoning reports and helps detect and prevent outbreaks.

Tall Poppy helps companies protect their employees from online harassment and abuse. The service combines proactive security awareness training and threat intelligence with compassionate care in cases where employees are targets of stalking, revenge porn, or other nastiness.

HoneyLove is introducing Sculptwear – an alternative to traditional shapewear that gives a smooth and tucked-in look under clothing, without the bunching/rolling that's common in all current shapewear.

Additor is an intelligent research assistant that helps users to find, organize, and share information & research. The platform features a visualized, organized, accessible, and searchable collaborative knowledge library that can be integrated with channels including Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote, Facebook, Slack, GitHub, and more.

Immersive Systems is a software company delivering spatial applications for mobile, multi-screen environments, and AR/VR. HOOPS!, their first ImmerseOS app, offers a combination of interactive stats visualizations, multimedia, and social interaction.

oodly provides a platform that lets any employer offer student loan assistance to employees affordably. The technology solution lets employers make regular contributions towards paying down employees' student loans while allowing employees to automate their regular payments and access expert student loan counseling through a student loan wellness platform.

Kinside is a membership to access child care, concierge support, and saving for busy working parents. Its nationwide network of daycares and preschools connects working parents with available and reliable child care that works for their lives and their budgets.

MentalHappy is an online mental health platform on a mission to make mental health care an accessible, affordable, and stigma-free reality for everyone. MentalHappy strives to be culturally sensitive and is an online mental health platform designed to provide people of all races, genders, and economic statuses a safe and secure platform to talk about their emotional health and the challenges they face in their daily lives and receive support from others who understand what they're experiencing. With free mental health resources and professionally-led support groups, MentalHappy is making it possible for everyone to get the emotional help they deserve without financial or physical limitations.
Federacy, based in Walnut, CA, is a bug bounty platform. It enlists experts to find bugs in software.

HappiLabs provides a variety of services to help scientists and biotech labs perform better with finance and lab operations. Its primary service is called the Virtual Lab Manager, which is an outsourced lab manager and purchasing department.
Mutiny helps business-to-business, software-as-a-service companies present a message that's customized to each visitor on their website.
JetLenses is an online retailer of contact lenses.
Third Impact, dba The Computer Science Proficiency Assessment (CSPA), is a standardized exam for software engineers.
AskMyClass uses smart speakers like the Amazon Alexa to allow teachers hand off a range of daily tasks such as vocabulary reviews. list making, and note taking.
SkydropX is a platform that connects local, independent delivery agents with small businesses that need last-mile pickup or delivery services in Latin America.
Canary Technologies replaces paper documentation with computer software to streamline hotel booking processes.

Tenderd is a heavy equipment rental marketplace for the Middle East and North Africa. Tenderd makes it easy for contractors to rent heavy machinery such as bulldozers and cranes for running their projects.

FREY is a brand of elevated laundry products tailored toward men, using formulas designed to better care for the users' clothing and scents inspired by men's fragrances, in a better-designed package and using a DTC, tech-enabled business model.
Explaain, dba Savvy, brings together all of a company's cloud-based platforms into one single view.
Cloud Workout is a cloud based live streaming platform for workout classes.
Grabb-It is a location-based digital advertising platform that gives advertisers the opportunity to reach consumers at the point of purchase.
BHRD ("Be Heard") helps public companies learn about and communicate with their shareholders.
Inscribe provides tools to identify fraudulent documents.
Spate provides intel on what beauty products or trends consumers are searching for online.
Prodigal offers a collection intelligence platform that specializes in debt management and collection services.
Regology is a modern regulatory compliance company that uses artificial intelligence technology to identify applicable regulations and keep financial institutions in compliance.
Enveritas allows companies secure themselves against reputational risk and increase efficiency in their operations.
Mylk Guys is an online 100 percent vegan grocery store.
Easol is an all-in-one platform for managing an entire experience business. Users can sell directly on their own website with smart booking, payment, and marketing tools that all work together.
AnchorUSD, aka AnchorCoin, is a cryptocurrency backed one-for-one by the US dollar.
Berbix is an identity verification for all kinds of peer-to-peer marketplaces and online platforms.

Dataform is a collaborative platform that enables teams to build and orchestrate SQL based data transformations in a data warehouse.On December 9th 2020, Dataform was acquired by Google Cloud. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Activeloop introduces a deep learning platform designed to enable faster deep learning training, fully managed hybrid cloud, and comprehensive model tracking and analysis.
LemonBox is an e-commerce platform that provides monthly subscription packages for daily nutritional supplements.
Osh's Affordable Pharmaceuticals is a public benefit corporation connecting doctors and patients with sources of low-cost, compounded pharmaceuticals.
Incentiveai has built artificial intelligence simulations that test not just for security holes, but for how greedy or illogical humans can crater a blockchain community.
Toybox is pitching a software service that lets designers communicate changes to developers on any website without ever having to write a line of code.
And Comfort is a fashion brand with stylish, minimalist offerings for plus-size women, including tunic shirts and an apron dress.
Modern Treasury is a payments operations software provider that allows businesses to initiate, monitor, and reconcile payments.
Abacus Protocol allows any company to tokenize both fungible and non-fungible assets (like commodities, equities, or debt) and automate their compliance demands.
Pulse is a mobile application and website designed to aggregate and share student public opinion on college campuses.
Medinas is a marketplace and technology-driven asset management platform that helps health care organizations of all types to resell and redeploy their pre-owned medical equipment and supplies.

iLabService is an IoT solution provider, with a portfolio spanning from system architecture, embedded firmware design, sensor solutions, gateway and cloud solutions, and advanced analytics solution enabled by algorithms.
Radix Labs makes software that uses existing lab robotics to execute experiments. It turns formal lab protocol descriptions into instructions for robots to execute.
NewCraft Technologies uses computer vision to turn screen recordings into gamified walkthroughs.
Hypcloud is building a real estate development financing platform in Germany.
Klarity offers a subscription cloud service that checks contracts in Microsoft Word documents, making suggestions when it sees something that doesn't match up with the playbook checklist.

Synkrino Biotherapeutics is a precision medicine analytics platform providing monitoring for pediatric rheumatologists for life-threatening conditions.Synkrino Biotherapeutics is currently building a rapid, portable field test for the RNA virus 2019-nCoV/COVID-19, adapting its existing analytic protocols for community public health screening.
Curebase runs clinical trials via software that reduces recruitment times, automates manual steps, and lets drug companies distribute their trials to clinics.

OneGraph is a GraphQL service that aims to connect the world wide web's SaaS APIs and help customers build integrations. It also handles automatic parallelization, queuing, and caching behind a single request, perfect for web and mobile apps. OneGraph provides components to handle the whole authenticate flow and it is based in San Francisco, California. On November 18, 2021, OneGraph was acquired by Netlify. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
DreamCraft is a platform that lets video game modders create and monetize games without writing code.
Duffel offers an online travel booking system.
Yseulis allows small and medium-sized businesses to control their foreign exchange risks.

Alexsei is a web-based software tool that provides answers to legal research questions in memo format and is exclusively for legal professionals. Alexsei permits law firms to organize their database of legal research memoranda more efficiently. A firm's can also upload an existing databse of legal memoranda and exploit Alexsei's sophisticated search tool to more easily review past work that has already been completed within the firm.

Crescendo is modernizing unconscious bias training. Its technology analyzes workplace communication channels to identify unconscious bias and then delivers empathy-based education, personalized to each employee.

Pulse Labs develops tools to improve user experience for the voice application market. Pulse Labs helps brands understand how real people interact with voice apps through a process of live testing and data analysis.
Intelistyle uses A.I. powered styling to personalize the customer experience of fashion retailers by styling their customers with the right clothes and outfits for them, online or in store.

Kono Labs (코노랩스) offers an AI-powered email scheduling assistant. Users just have to CC Kono and it will suggest meeting times based on user's scheduling preferences and automatically mark it on their calendar once it is confirmed.
AxiomAI is a browser assistant that lets users automate business processes and share them with others.

BeeInstant is a cloud-based metric monitoring company. The company's analytics engine converts vast amounts of metric data into insights that uncover stories of user experience, application performance, and infrastructure health.On December 17, 2019 BeeInstant was acquired by Instana . The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Datarade offers a platform for companies to discover, compare and connect with data providers across the globe.
Recotap aims to help brands to engage their customers better. With AI-driven personalization, brands can provide superior customer experience across devices.

SegmentStream is a customer data platform based on a single API, which unifies customer data, stores it in the cloud. Current tag management solutions require API documentation, manual integration of each system with JavaScript, and manual testing of each integration in different environments.
Weview is a platform for video reviews of products. Users can earn money with their product recommendations and receive test items.

SoftCube provides a solution for personalized merchandising and product recommendations for ecommerce by helping retailers increase sales by 15-20% allowing cross-selling and up-selling. A mathematical model allows the platform to use small amounts of customer data to generate recommendations for different products, including niche ones.
Repassa is an online platform for buying, selling, and donating used fashion items.On July 15, 2021, Repassa was acquired by Lojas Renner. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
Tillit Forsikring is a Norwegian insurance technology company based in Oslo.
Genuine Tea is an online tea store specializing in premium quality loose leaf teas.

ShapeMe is an online platform for wellness and fitness that allows users to book treatments at home, and find and get in touch with gyms and personal trainers. For professionals and owners of gyms and fitness centers, it is a window through which they can promote themselves and gain new customers.
Meitre is a guest manager for restaurants to book tables based on demand trends, rotate tables efficiently, introduce dynamic pricing techniques, host events, and book tables with credit cards.

Secured helps users purchase sneakers & streetwear before they sell out. With a Secured membership, users get access to its community and tools like sneaker bots, early links, and raffles all in one place.

Swayable lets political campaigns and brands measure how content changes people's minds. Campaigners using Swayable are increasing their impact on opinions by measuring persuasion instead of just optimizing for engagement and clicks. Swayable's data science platform delivers results in hours instead of weeks, and breaks down exactly which kinds of people respond to which content. The platform is being used to power new forms of rapid-response digital campaigning.
EnvKey offers a simple, end-to-end encrypted alternative that lets development teams keep their API keys secure just as easily as they manage their passwords.
Linsation provides intelligent voice input solution and test service.

Whispli provides a secure, anonymous, and cost-effective whistleblower platform and case management solution. Whispli enables employees to easily and anonymously report fraud, harassment, discrimination and unethical behavior, helping to uncover blind spots within organizations.
Axel is a staff onboarding agent that uses practices to ensure new-hire retention.

Groover allows artists and their representatives to send a tune directly and easily to blogs, radios, playlists, independent journalists, labels, and bookers of their choice for small amounts of money and be guaranteed to receive at least a written feedback on their music.
Stockly allows e-commerce websites to keep selling when out-of-stock, and the product is shipped by another merchant of Stockly's network, who still has it in stock.
Pandium aims to make it easier for B2B software companies to support integrations. The platform handles authentication, scheduling and other basic issues.
Burlap & Barrel works directly with spice farms and cooperatives around the world to bring equitably sourced spices to professionals and home chefs in the United States.
Clever Girl Finance is a financial education platform aimed at providing women with financial guidance.
Concert Finance automates financial reporting for sales commissions.On August 10th, 2021, Concert Finance was acquired by Varicent. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
SAWA is an automated graphic design platform. It lets marketing teams create on-brand campaign assets for every channel--instantly.
Necto is an internet provider that aims to enable individuals to start their own internet service providers.

Trellis leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning to allow attorneys to research issues and judges, prepare motions targeted to their trial judge's preferences, and predict settlement ranges and class member payouts.

Uhura Solutions is an AI platform that reads and understands contracts and agreements just as humans do. The company helps financial institutions speed up review and decision-making processes by streamlining the process of analyzing and drafting contracts and agreements.
Sensytec offers cloud-based structural health monitoring solutions. Its software and hardware provide intelligence from data gathered during design, placement, performance, and maintenance.

BigTeam is a feedback platform that makes it easier to engage customers, users and fans through feedback. Small business owners, startup founders and growing brands use it to get ideas for new products, quick feedback on the customer experience, and on-demand inspiration for how to improve or grow their brands.

Voyager is a cloud-based workflow management solution for the bulk shipping value chain. Voyager allows users to invite their partners, colleagues and counter-parties into a single environment to coordinate the execution of bulk shipping operations.

Open Room operates Forest OCR, a real estate SaaS platform that offers business efficiency tools to real estate brokerages. The platform uses OCR technology to enable real estate companies to create and edit property proposals, manage customers, access property information, and more.
Treasury Prime build API banking technology that improves the economics of banking to empower transformative financial services.
Developer of a gaming app in which players and coaches can contact each other.

Product Lead is software that empowers influencers, brands, and publishers to generate sales from their content. Product Lead changes regular images into shoppable images and provides the tools for building e-commerce experiences.
Clarisights gives marketers end-to-end access to data across their entire marketing stack in a single place.

Int3 Software develops the unique anti-fusion solution EQU8. The product is aimed at all online games; from the most competitive eSports games, to the more casual titles. EQU8 is more than just a SaaS solution, since the additional service offers what else would have been a whole anti-fraud department.
Nettowork is an online professional networking platform.

News Break is a technology-driven interest-oriented content portal that gives users the power to efficiently define and explore their interests. News Break algorithmically delivers personally relevant content and news, pulled from various sources.
MedCircuit is an artificial intelligence triage software assisting doctors and nurses in the clinical setting to improve efficiency in both emergency medicine and general practice.

Promorph Solutions, dba EmpowerU, is an analytical web-based solution aiming to redeﬁne the ways educational institutions are managed. The application facilitates automation, monitoring and analysis of diﬀerent facets of institute operations. The embedded analytical capabilities generate insights which help to address the bottlenecks in achieving good governance, quality education, cost eﬀective operations, eﬃcient time utilization and revenue generation.
MadGuy Labs offers mobile-based exam test preparation services for government jobs in four local languages including Kannada, Telugu, Marathi and Hindi, apart from English.
Nimana Fashions, dba Enakshi, is an online site for women's apparel that offers only exclusive pieces of garments with no two pieces alike.
iSwip designs, manufactures and sells connected solutions for businesses.
Cramstack is a Business Intelligence platform that helps customers organize, search and analyze their enterprise data.

Sentetic is a Cloud-based machine learning platform. Analyzing data from existing industrial devices, Sentetic monitors the equipment involved in the production process, preventing damage and malfunctioning.

loudML is a machine learning add-on for Elasticsearch, InfluxData's TICK stack, and other data providers. loudML provides three types of tools: unsupervised machine learning to increase business productivity, outlier detection to pinpoint anomalies in real-time data, and predictive maintenance tools.

pixyle uses artificial intelligence to recognize garments in images.The platform then looks for similarities to the clothes of the companies it works with. Through this process, it gives recommendations on where to buy the particular garment. The platform optimizes consumer experience and at the same time delivers targeted sales to partner companies.
Xane.ai is an AI chatbot aimed at enhancing employee experience, building, learning, and developing enterprise culture.

Taktify offers users a smart post-management solution for social media through AI. Using both text data mining and image recognition, it is able to provide businesses with valuable insight into customer feedback, profiles and preferences.
Catevering is a comparison platform enabling companies to customize and reserve catering services online for meetings and work events.
Legends of Signum is a war-game with miniature and a collectible card game.
GrocerApp is a web and mobile platform that enables users to order groceries and have them delivered.

Revolution Blockchain develops and publishes distributed apps and games that leverage blockchain technology. Revolution Blockchain's first product is currently under development and will leverage blockchain technology for both payment (i.e. the purchase & sale of virtual assets) and the storage of these assets via non-fungible tokens that live on the blockchain.
Hopfab connects consumers with craftsmen who bring their home furnishing ideas to life. It also sells already made pieces on its site.

TrackOFF builds tools to protect users' identities and personal lives. TrackOFF prevents online ID theft, shields the user's internet browsing history from prying eyes, shows who's trying to track the user and stops them, and more. Its dashboard gives the user a snapshot of the privacy threats it's prevented, as well as statistics on how well the user is being protected.

Our.News fights misinformation and fake news by providing a neutral platform which lets the public judge what's factual, thoughtfully-reported and unbiased-and what isn't. Users rate any news story for spin, trust, accuracy and legitimacy.
Toppr is an after-school learning app that provides learning courses and entrance exam tutoring.On July 12, 2021, Toppr was acquired by BYJU's at a valuation of $150M.

Voonik provides a personal shopping platform that acts as a personal stylist to help people dress well within their budget. Voonik offers multiple stores on a single platform and lets consumers shop in a single checkout. With over half a million SKUs, Voonik is one of the largest stores of its kind offering apparel, accessories and footwear as well as beauty products.

AuditionMe is a social platform that is focused on building a better world for Creators. Anyone can become a Creator simply by posting video and photo content on AuditionMe. Users can find new talent and content they love on the platform.

UrbanFox is a platform for online merchants, banks and payment processors to identify and predict cases of complex synthetic fraud. This type of fraud is highly complex and organized and it can take weeks or months for it to be detected. UrbanFox simulates fraudulent behavioral patterns in real-time and compares them to real-world behaviors. In trials the industry average for detecting this type of fraud is about 44%, UrbanFox can detect 91% of this type of fraud.

Papercup uses speech processing to translate videos. Users upload their video, its system builds a model of their voice and translates it into the output language, and the user downloads the translated video.

Nivoda is a solution for buying and selling diamonds. Users can instantly buy diamonds from multiple trusted suppliers in a single checkout and save on every order with consolidated shipping and payments. It features 360 degree diamond videos at 40x magnification to provide confidence in purchases.

Beneficiary is a data collection tool powered by machine learning and behavioral science, engineered for the charitable sector. By using cutting-edge web technologies and behavioral science, its frictionless user experience enables data collection directly from beneficiaries.

TokenAnalyst brings transparency to the decentralized economy. Its data helps answer questions such as: who is holding a given token and for how long? Is the token being used for its stated utility? How does token velocity and centralization affect the price?On May 5th, 2020, the company announced it was shutting down.

WantHub is an eCommerce service that will change the way consumers purchase goods. Using a "Pay What You Want" (PWYW) model combined with its patent pending Dreamcatcher engine, WantHub will allow consumers to find the products they are looking for by matching them with a seller who is willing to sell the desired item at their desired price.

Choosy is an on-demand social shopping platform where users influence every collection to match their favorite style inspirations. Through social tagging and a team of Style Scouts, Choosy identifies and manufactures trend-driven fashion delivered to shoppers in as little as two weeks.

Flume Health focuses on lowering the cost of medical care and delivering a personalized patient experience. Its human healthcare concierge service finds patients highly-rated providers, personally books their appointments, and answers all questions along the way.

StellarEmploy is similar to a marketplace for jobs, but instead of connecting people to jobs based on keywords, it connects people to jobs based on their preferences, skill sets, and a proprietary algorithm.

Welnys is a marketplace for workplace wellness services that connects companies to vetted health and wellness professionals in yoga, nutrition, mobile medical and more. Companies also receive digital tools to help increase engagement, manage attendance and report metrics.

Weird Enough Productions is a media company that uses original content to teach middle and high school students media literacy. PeopleJoy is an employee benefit program that attracts and keeps millennial talent using student loan repayment assistance, financial health coaching, and matched savings plans. The platform is designed for CEOs and business leaders struggling to address a talent shortage.

As an "algorithmic central bank", Basis runs a rules-based monetary policy and achieves a price stability mandate - all while operating without the need for human discretion.

4D ShoeTech is a SaaS platform that allows footwear designers and developers to ideate, prototype, and showcase design vision in photorealistic 4D.

Huizhenbang is a service platform that helps patients find experts and helps primary hospitals with healthcare, education, and research by sending in experts and providing legal, insurance, and home visiting services.

Smart Yoke provides business SaaS systems for gas stations to incorporate intelligent operation and management, including smart pay, and recharge card system, membership and marketing system, and more.
Akribian helps children improve their maths skills by turning math studies into digital adventures by merging imaginative game design with CBT based learning methods.

OpsMind is a low-code operation and maintenance development platform that provides ITSM technology for cloud services, including full-stack monitoring and alarm system, resource configuration management system, visual workflow editor, front-end solution page editor, and more.
Sound Republica is a global music distribution & publishing company that distributes music globally through its original data transferring and archiving system.

Set Labs develops tools that enable developers to bundle crypto assets together called Sets, which allow users to create cryptocurrency baskets, baskets of NFTs, baskets of on-chain securities, and more. The company’s products include TokenSets, a smart contract-based asset management platform utilizing Ethereum technology.

Machbase is a columnar database management system tailored to process machine data such as time series log data. It enables clients to collect, store, query, and analyze sensor data generated in production facilities in manufacturing, transportation, logistics, power plants & energy, smart factory, edge computing, and other industries.
Dongchi is a subscription-based weight management meal kit brand based in China.
ZIEL Home Furnishing Technology is a B2C e-commerce business.
Lenus eHealth is an all-in-one platform helping fitness coaches build a strong and sustainable online business.
Debtsy develops a data-driven platform that offers end-to-end resolution services for delinquent and charged-off consumer loans.
17mei develops online tools for medical professionals in the beauty industry and provides case management, operation data, patient consulting, and more.
Farm Taaza is a B2B fresh produce ecommerce enterprise. Farm Taaza's customers can place and track orders on the company's web and mobile platform.

Crocus Energy develops an energy data analytics platform that addresses essential parts of the energy infrastructure and provides solutions to empower energy consumers to better understand their energy data. The company's software helps customers to understand and optimize how electricity is delivered to every device in their large, energy-intensive facilities to drive business value.

Mimosa Diagnostics is a mobile health platform focused on patient monitoring and assessment tools. Driven by AI and delivered through the cloud, MIMOSA uses multi-spectral mobile tissue analysis to go beyond anatomy and assess the physiology of tissue health.

Youzan (HKG: 8083) is a solution provider of mobile retail for business. The company operates through four business segments. The General Trading Operations segment is engaged in the trading of watches, computers, communication equipment, currency sorters, and other goods. The Prepaid Card and Related Operations segment is engaged in the marketing and sales of consumer goods in the form of prepaid gift cards in China, as well as the provision of third-party payment services and consultancy services. The Travelers Related Services segment is engaged in the provision of air-ticketing services and related customer services. The Onecomm segment is engaged in the provision of third-party payment system solutions and sales of integrated smart point of sales (POS) devices.
INNOLIFE is an artificial intelligence company that aims to provide clients with personalized insurance planning and consulting service.

ST-CREDITECH focuses on the logistics industry-related business risk management, supply chain finance, insurance technology and other fields. By integrating information resources such as information flow, capital flow and logistics, it creates a risk management solution based on intelligent data analysis.

Doodod (独到科技) is a vertical social network for Chinese IT talents. Users can both keep with old friends and meet new friends to extend professional career networks. They can also discuss the topics they are interested in and get jobs through their friend's connections.

Topica EdTech Group provides online English-speaking classes, a marketplace of short skill courses with video teaching materials, and a platform that enables universities in the region to offer online degree programs.

Green Years is a nationwide sports industry group company. The company's three major business sections, "Greenery Years", "Greenery Space", and "Greenery Star Show", respectively focus on the development and operation of the sports Internet SaaS platform, sports goods O2O sales and supply chain management, and urban sports events services, aiming to provide for events.
DeepMoney (涌服金融) develops and provides service in artificial intelligence capital markets.

SHEIN is an international B2C fast fashion e-commerce platform. The company mainly focuses on women's wear, but it also offers men's apparel, children's clothes, accessories, shoes, bags, and other fashion items. SHEIN mainly targets Europe, America, Australia, and the Middle East along with other consumer markets.

Serving Cloud is a SaaS service company that helps large group companies to establish supplier collaborative management, provide contract and output value, invoice, settlement, supply chain finance, and other management and coordination services between suppliers and core enterprises.
Tshe is an online ordering platform for custom-printed t-shirt, sweaters, polo shirt, and other customizable products.

Krisp is a software that removes background noises during calls. It filters out background sound from both the speaker's microphone and from the incoming sound on the other end of the call. It integrates with many applications and provides both a mobile and desktop version of the product.
WiseVine is a GovTech company that provides a database service for local governments and private companies, as well as a matching platform to facilitate public-private partnerships.
EMQX is an open-source MQTT 5.0 broker for IoT in the 5G era, massively scalable and highly available clustering, running anywhere from edge to cloud.
Quancai (全材网) is a construction material e-commerce platform.

Provider of block-chain services for artificial intelligence (AI) industry. The company develops an open source project as the running platform for AI applications. Users can tokens to do transactions for AI services globally.

Provider of marketplace platform that focuses on listing Singapore freelancers across a wide range of categories. The company offers a marketplace where users can browse hundreds of Singapore freelancers' individual profiles to learn more about what they offer and proceed to contact them directly via mobile number or email.

Description: Operator of an e-commerce second-hand fashion platform.

Qingfan is an operator of an online platform for projects. The company operates a platform that users can participate in open online projects around the world. Its platform aims to help users to get different work experience and find potential job opportunities.
